means: 拖长腔调慢吞吞说的话

sentence.Network_en: Mr. Peter spoke in a soft drawl.
sentence.Network_cn: 彼得先生说话声音轻柔而缓慢.

sentence.Network_en: His mother was speaking with a slight drawl.
sentence.Network_cn: 他母亲说话的声音稍稍拖长一下.

sentence.Network_en: She speaks with a Southern drawl.
sentence.Network_cn: 她讲话带着美国南方人慢吞吞的拉长调子的语气.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 蓝宝词典 ... draconian adj. 严峻的，苛刻的 drawl v. 懒洋洋地说，慢慢地说 dreary adj. 沉闷的.
英语词根6 - Leo.Zhu - 博客园 ... dome n 圆屋顶；大厦 drawl v 拉长语调说话 dromedary n 善跑的骆驼（通常指用来赛跑的骆驼）.
黄颀课堂讲义单词 - 豆丁网 ... croon 低声歌唱 drawl 慢吞吞地说 prate 瞎扯,胡说.
慢声细语地说话（drawl），就象抽（draw）丝一样，气若游丝？可不是什么好兆头啊！

list.abs: (certain) 极之肯定 dead to the world 睡得很香 dear Jone letter 绝交信 deep southern drawl 拉长语调的南方口音 definte word 确定的消息 deliver the goods.

the manufacturer of this nightmare was a drawling police officer's son and career criminal from Shreveport , Louisiana , named Danny Harold Rolling .制造这些凶杀案件的恶魔是一名警察的儿子，名叫丹尼·罗德·林，一名来自路易斯安那州什里夫波特的职业罪犯。
a southern drawl , a world unseen ; a city wall and a trampoline .一个南方口音，一个看不见的世界，一个城市的墙和蹦床。
Costner's voice is instantly recognizable on the phone-a soft , slow Californian drawl as reassuring as a family doctor house call .科斯特纳的声音从话筒里可以立刻辨认出来。他的声音柔和、缓慢，带有加利福尼亚口音，好象家庭医生上门看病人时的宽慰声音。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: probably originally slang, from Low German or Dutch dralen 'delay, linger'

entry.tran: 拉长调子说;慢吞吞地说
entry.def: If someone drawls, they speak slowly and not very clearly, with long vowel sounds.

example.ex: 'I guess you guys don't mind if I smoke?' he drawled...
example.tran: “伙计们，我想你们不介意我抽烟吧？”他拉长音调说。

example.ex: He has a deep voice and he drawls slightly.
example.tran: 他嗓音低沉，说话略带拖腔。

means.word_mean: 1. a slow speech pattern with prolonged vowels
1. lengthen and slow down or draw out;

sentences.en: The old woman was drawling on and on.
sentences.cn: 这个老太太慢吞吞地说个没完。
